text: وَمَرۡيَمَ ٱبۡنَتَ عِمۡرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ
translation: 12. Kaadu Yalli yeemeneh yan mará ceelallo yoogorech baxxaqise, Maryam Qimraan baxay isi sammo dalwak dacrissê caalatal, tokkel Yalli Jibriil amriseh diriqik moyya как culta aracak fuffu teetik ixxic kaak iyyech, woo fuñó tet maxax (maganat) toofeeh wonna luk is Nabii Qiisal tussukuqqeeh, is isi Rabbi qangor kce kay kitooba nummasseeh, Yalla oggola maray qibaada kaah caglisak tiyak teyna tekke.
